code: # Market Condition Codes - Compound format for consolidation fade analysis

description: Price was trending up before entering consolidation
Price was trending down before entering consolidation
Insufficient data to determine prior trend

code: # === RANGE QUALITY (how tight is the consolidation) ===

description: Very narrow range - Bollinger squeeze or BB width < 5%

code: # === POSITION IN RANGE (where we're fading from) ===

description: Short entry near top of range (BB %B > 80%)
Long entry near bottom of range (BB %B < 20%)
Volume declining + relative vol < 0.7 - classic consolidation, good for fade
Volume increasing + relative vol > 1.5 - BREAKOUT WARNING, fade risky
8:00-10:00 CT - First 2 hours of regular session
After 15:00 CT - End of day positioning
low vol = typical consolidation but direction uncertain
